#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{int l,m,n;
	scanf("%d%d%d",&l,&m,&n);
	int count=0;
	if(m-l<=n-m){
		
	while(m<n-1&&l<n-1)
	{if(count%2==0)
	l=m+1;
	else 
	m=l+1;
	count++;
	
}}
else 
{while(m-1>l&&n-1>l)


{if(count%2==0)
n=m-1;
else 
m=n-1;
count++;
}
}
	

	cout<<count<<endl;
	return 0;
}
